welcomeParagraph1: Declutter work for your service and maintenance teams around the world. Give them access only to those customers and assets that they should be responsible for by grouping them into teams with specific assignments.
welcomeParagraph2: Selling through dealers? Group them into teams and assign them to specific customers and assets so they only view and work on whatâ€™s important for them.
welcomeWorkingPoints: Create a team and assign members to it
Assign customers and assets they should have access to
welcomeWorkingDescription: Now start creating work orders for customers this team is responsible for. These work orders will only be visible to this team (or any others that are assigned to the specific customer the work order is for) and to any users who are not part of any team.

selectFacility.label: Assign facilities
selectFacility.infoMessageWithoutProductionLine: All machines assigned to this facility will automatically be assigned to the team too
selectFacility.infoMessageWithProductionLine: All the production lines and machines of the facilities will be assigned to the team too.

selectProductionLine.label: Assign production lines
selectProductionLine.infoMessage: All the machines of the production line will be assigned to the team

teamMembersTab.unassignTitle: Are you sure you want to remove this member?

productionLinesTab.unassignMessage: Are you sure you want to unassign {{}} from this team?

machinesTab.unassignMessage: Are you sure you want to unassign {{}} from this team?

deleteAlert.title: Delete team?
deleteAlert.message1: Are you sure you want to you want to delete {{}} team?
deleteAlert.message2: Once deleted, all users of {{}} team will have access to all work orders, machines and facilities.
